EmailTemplate.subject: Mapping the Cloud Native Journey Begins Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of July 20, 2015 <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/mapping-the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-22-15> Mapping the Cloud Native Journey At OSCON this week the organizers reported over 30 talks submitted this year on Microservices topics, up from only one last year from the Pivotal team. As the leader in Cloud Native Java with Spring Boot/Cloud and Cloud Native Platforms with Cloud Foundry, Pivotal has been situated in the crossroads of microservices, continuous delivery, and multi-cloud portability since its founding in 2013. READ MORE <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/mapping-the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-22-15> Podcasts Using Data Science in Health and Life Sciences July 22, 2015 In this episode, host Simon Elisha speaks with Sarah Aerni, Pivotal's principal data scientist who leads our Healthcare and Life Sciences vertical. In the podcast, we explore with Sarah some of the work she's been doing in healthcare and life science, and how that looks from a data science perspective.
Listen Now <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-perspectives/features/using-data-science-in-health-and-life-sciences?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-22-15> Humana Partners With Pivotal to Rapidly Deliver Healthcare Solutions July 20, 2015 One of the most successful health care providers in the United States is using Pivotal Cloud Foundry and services from Pivotal Labs to help its 14 million customers live healthier lives. The company quickly recognized technology’s potential to help clients track steps and calories, monitor their blood pressure, and maintain healthy lifestyles by using mobile applications that offer useful healthcare advice.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies-2/humana-partners-with-pivotal-to-rapidly-deliver-healthcare-solutions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-7-22-15> Big Data Performance Benchmark: Pivotal HAWQ Beats Impala & Apache Hive July 21, 2015 In part one of this five blog series, Dan Baskette, Pivotal Director of Marketing for Data and Analytics, explains the impact of SQL performance on Hadoop and tees up the overall findings of an unaudited TPC-DS performance test, comparing Pivotal HAWQ, Apache Hive™, and Impala. He begins by explaining how speed, quality, completeness, and query effectiveness are important considerations in the world of SQL on Hadoop. Then, he outlines overall test results, testing environments, and requirements.
